column1: I know that my job is fighting for the jobs of the hardworking people of our state which is why my first post-election priority will be defeating COVID-19 and getting the economy back on track.

The people of North Carolina need support and that’s why I voted for historic relief for families and small businesses. I shared some of our accomplishments in fighting COVID-19 during a visit in Brunswick County this past weekend as part of my statewide tour: https://t.co/SPuH43CixO

I am about to finish my COVID-19 quarantine – and I can’t wait to begin hearing from Judge Amy Coney Barrett about her excellent qualifications and her Constitutionalist philosophy. She will make an outstanding Supreme Court Justice.
Joining @FoxNews shortly for my first interview since testing positive for COVID-19. Hope you tune in!
Here’s what I’m doing to support COVID-19 research our frontline healthcare workers and North Carolina businesses impacted by this pandemic:   https://t.co/qlJhfrn9x6

While I’m feeling much better than I did just yesterday not all victims of COVID19 are recovering as seamlessly-- we should continue to be diligent of best practices like washing hands and social distancing to end the spread of this dangerous disease.  https://t.co/t527YSjKSc
Cal Cunningham's "good starting point" for COVID relief? Giving taxpayer-funded stimulus checks and healthcare to illegal immigrants. #ncpol #ncsen https://t.co/3p8HssjzBG

I’ve held over 60 tele-townhalls to hear from you about how COVID-19 is impacting your lives and your jobs – and I continue to hear the same thing: that we need to extend the PPP with another relief bill.  Cal Cunningham said he would vote against it because it’s the party line. https://t.co/YaCQF31JOc
Who should we trust more on defeating COVID-19: the trial lawyers and career politicians or the world-renowned scientists?  You know my answer. https://t.co/hRYDQPVmVv

Cal Cunningham’s comments casting doubt on an FDA-approved COVID-19 vaccine for political gain are dangerous and put lives at risk.   https://t.co/IxYPUOvLmc

I agree with @SecMandyCohen. It's a shame Cal Cunningham does not. His lack of confidence in our scientific community including those working hard on the vaccine here in NC is reckless. He is putting lives at risk with his "hesitancy" to take an FDA-approved COVID-19 vaccine. https://t.co/mszaWJDMRW

This week I voted to extend COVID-19 relief for North Carolina families and small businesses – but Chuck Schumer blocked it and Cal Cunningham opposed it. They don't care about providing relief for North Carolina families.

I just voted to extend COVID relief but Democrats including Cal Cunningham opposed this measure. Cunningham doesn't care about helping NC. He only cares about playing politics which is why he hypocritically criticized the PPP while the company that was paying him got PPP loans
It’s simple: If an American company finds the COVID vaccine I believe American citizens should get vaccinated first before it goes overseas.   https://t.co/yaCIk33m11

Today's job numbers are another step in the right direction but we still need to pass an additional COVID-19 relief bill to ensure this recovery continues. The one thing we cannot afford to do is allow Cal Cunningham to raise taxes kill jobs & reverse the progress we've made.
